description: A speedy salad that's loaded with freshness, this vibrant side dish with peaches, nectarines, mozzarella and an easy dressing makes entertaining a breeze.
keywords: Fruit salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Summer,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Peach & Nectarine Salad With Buffalo Mozzarella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 yellow peaches, halved, destoned, cut into thick wedges
2 yellow nectarines, halved, destoned, cut into thick wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange peach, nectarine, spinach mix and mozzarella on a serving platter.
Whisk lemon juice and oil in a small bowl until combined. Season. Serve salad drizzled with dressing and scattered with basil.
